page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF YVONNE
page.content: I usually get up at 8.30,make my bed and then have my breakfast of tea and toast.Michelle comes for me and we go for Marina on the way to school. We stop by Bremners for a playpiece.At school we sit at the pegs and discuss the latest gossip or go out and play netball.Class begins at 9.30 and in the morning we usually do Maths,Mental English, Reading etc.At our 11 o'clock break we eat our crisps, talk and wander about the playground . I may go home for lunch at 1p.m. or stay and have school dinners. The afternoon activities are more fun eg drawing, discussing,researching etc. After school there may be netball.On my way home I stop by mum in the paper shop. After my tea and homework I go out with my friends along the street,go to someone's house to listen to records or go to the new playpark till 8.30.
